title: GSATechDose #2
author: GSATechDose Team
content:
![GSATechDose Logo](images/TechDose2.png)

# 🚀 How to Get Started with Microsoft Global Secure Access

Looking to modernize your network security and embrace Zero Trust? Microsoft's Global Secure Access is your gateway to secure, identity-aware access for both internet and private resources—without the need for legacy VPNs.

Here's how to get started:

✅ Enable 𝗘𝗻𝘁𝗿𝗮 𝗣𝗿𝗶𝘃𝗮𝘁𝗲 𝗔𝗰𝗰𝗲𝘀𝘀

✅ Install & configure the 𝗣𝗿𝗶𝘃𝗮𝘁𝗲 𝗡𝗲𝘁𝘄𝗼𝗿𝗸 𝗖𝗼𝗻𝗻𝗲𝗰𝘁𝗼𝗿

✅ Set up 𝗤𝘂𝗶𝗰𝗸 𝗔𝗰𝗰𝗲𝘀𝘀 as a VPN replacement

✅ Install the 𝗚𝗹𝗼𝗯𝗮𝗹 𝗦𝗲𝗰𝘂𝗿𝗲 𝗔𝗰𝗰𝗲𝘀𝘀 𝗖𝗹𝗶𝗲𝗻𝘁

✅ Seamlessly access 𝗼𝗻-𝗽𝗿𝗲𝗺 𝘀𝗵𝗮𝗿𝗲𝗱 𝗳𝗼𝗹𝗱𝗲𝗿𝘀

🎥 𝗪𝗮𝘁𝗰𝗵 𝗻𝗼𝘄 𝗮𝗻𝗱 Enable Entra Private Access in less than 10 minutes:

[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MfcZ3zQhF-4](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MfcZ3zQhF-4)
